titleStmt.title: The true petition of the entire body of the kingdome of Scotland With an act of the secret Councell of Scotland upon the same petition. As also the copy of a letter sent up with this true and authenticke act of councell from a good friend. To the right honourable and truly noble the lords of his Majesties priviy councell for Scotland, shewing their obedience to his Majesty, and their hearty affection to his loyall & weldeserving Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Lindesay, and are to be sold by Iohn Giles, at Davids Inne in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: "They wish to preserve the peace between England and Scotland, and to prevent any intermeddling between the King and English Parliament in their differences." -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
